attributes.action: allow Connie Talbot to perform at the Royal Variey Show
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Connie Talbot, the 6 year old finalist, from ITV's Britain's Got Talent should be allowed to perform to the queen at the Royal Variey Show. Her performances in the auditions, semi finals & final of the TV show have captivated the world. Her videos on YouTube have been watched over 4 million times.She deserves to be allowed to show her talents to the queen.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
